item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, July 2, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Anger mounts at Biden’s inner circle after debate debacle
2. Starmer accepted £76,000 of freebies including tickets to over 20 football games
3. US Supreme Court says Trump immune for ‘official acts’ as president
4. [Opinion] Joe Biden and the tragedy of liberal denialism
5. Le Pen says she will seek to form government even if short of outright majority
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, July 2, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
